title: Biogen Idec and Sobi announce positive top-line efficacy and safety results from phase 3 Alprolix paediatric study
description: Biogen Idec and Swedish Orphan Biovitrum AB announced positive top-line results of the Kids B-LONG Phase 3 clinical study that evaluated the safety, efficacy and pharmacokinetics of Alprolix® [Coa ...
